comment.author: 34452566@N02
comment._content: This is really cool. I play rugby for a girls team, its hard to be a girl playing a guys sport. Im glad that the uniforms dont look like that anymore.

comment.author: 74214364@N00
comment._content: Actually, girl's rugby is one of the fastest growing sports in the USA.  They take it seriously and play from the heart.  I'm glad the uniforms don't look like that anymore either.  LOL
